description: Number of partitional matroids on n elements.
references: Recski, A.; Enumerating partitional matroids. Stud. Sci. Math. Hungar. 9 (1974), 247-249 (1975).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
Index entries for sequences related to matroids
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from _James A. Sellers_, Aug 21 2000
